---
name: Standard user story
about: Use this template for product backlog / story requests
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''
---

## Summary
As a [role],
I need [something]
So that [benefit]

## Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin)
Given [context]
When [action]
Then [outcome]

## Implementation notes / details
- API endpoints, DB model hints, infra notes, etc.

## Story points
- Estimate (e.g. 1,2,3,5,8)

## Labels
- enhancement OR technical debt

## Done checklist
- [ ] Code implemented
- [ ] Tests added
- [ ] Deploy pipeline passes
- [ ] Documentation updated
